data: Based on the question, "Is there a place that [child's name] USUALLY goes when [he\she] is sick or you need advice about [his\her] health?" and if there was at least one such place, a follow-up question was asked: "What kind of place is it\What kind of pl

Based on the question, "Is there a place that [child's name] USUALLY goes when [he\she] is sick or you need advice about [his\her] health?" and if there was at least one such place, a follow-up question was asked: "What kind of place is it\What kind of place does [child's name] go to most often - clinic, doctor's office, emergency room, or some other place?" The response categories for this second question were: "clinic or health center," "doctor's office or HMO," "hospital emergency room," "hospital outpatient department," "some other place," and "doesn't go to one place most often."
